name: offline_stm
description: ### Important GTFS files are too large to be uploaded to Github, so please [download all the GTFS files](http://www.stm.info/sites/default/files/gtfs/gtfs_stm.zip) and place them in `src/stm-files` locally to run locally.
author: Yuichi Hagio <yhagio87@gmail.com> (http://github.com/yhagio)
